name: Infested Nation
description: Infested Nation is a fast paced and brutal top down shooter. Outnumbered and outgunned, you will need to rely on your wits and reflexes to make it through each situation alive.
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft速 Windows速 7 / 8.1 / 10 Processor: 1.2 GHz processor of faster Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 8 compatible graphics card with 512mb video memory DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 112 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Microsoft速 Windows速 7 / 8.1 / 10 Processor: 1.4 GHz processor of faster Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 8 compatible graphics card with 512mb video memory DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 112 MB available space
